Description of incident: On February 10, 2012, DHI Mortgage became aware that a software security breach by external sources had occurred in its Internet Loan Prequalification System.  DHI Mortgage immediately isolated the affected server, purged certain affected files, and modified the electronic security measures.  People who provided their information online for pre-qualification may have had their names, Social Security numbers, dates of birth, contact information, marital status, employment information, income, asset information, and liability information exposed.
